catalog_script_client.name: Operating Hours variables - onSubmit

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_fd5c561fdb11c51001eafad3f39619f9
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="OLD Technical Services">3a6c66681b0c01905b1b411acd4bcb88</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Operating Hours variables - onSubmit</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
	var storedOH = parseInt(g_form.getValue('st_operating_hours'));
	var OH = parseInt(g_form.getValue('operating_hours'));
	if(OH != ''){
		if(OH < storedOH){
			alert('The New operating hours cannot be less the the current operating hours of the selected engine. Submit action is aborted.');
			//g_form.addErrorMessage('Please provide the appropriate hrs');

			return false;

		}
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>kristian.teodorov@doitwise.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-01 12:46:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>fd5c561fdb11c51001eafad3f39619f9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Operating Hours variables - onSubmit</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Support case" source="x_liisa_support_ca">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Support case">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_fd5c561fdb11c51001eafad3f39619f9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kristian.teodorov@doitwise.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-01 13:17:23</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>1</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
